Gorillaz x Reprezent
Gorillaz x Reprezent

In December 2017, Gorillaz held a three-day takeover on Reprezent with discussions, interviews & DJ mixes; ending with a live concert. Most of the takeover was later uploaded to Reprezent’s Mixcloud account.

Saturday | Sunday | Monday

SATURDAY 2ND DECEMBER
Sunday Roast’s ‘Celebrity Takedown’ [ft. Kieran Yates & Peter Robinson]
Gorillaz Mix Series: Russel

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-mix-series-russell-in-the-mix/

Sunday Roast’s ‘Slowboat to Hades’ [ft. Niellah & Juliette from gal-dem]
Gorillaz Mix Series: Claptone

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-x-reprezent-gorillaz-mix-series-claptone/

Gorillaz Mix Series: Nic Fanciulli

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-gorillaz-mix-series-nic-fanciulli/

Saturnz Barz Live at Pop Brixton
Part 1: Lil C

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-saturnz-barz-pt-1-lil-c/

Part 2: Epic B

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-saturnz-barz-ep-ii-epic-b/

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-saturnz-barz-ep-iii-manara/

https://www.mixcloud.com/Reprezent/gorillaz-saturnz-barz-pt-iv-cadenza-prynce-mini/
